text.description: {Catapult} Use this war machine to target your enemy's fortifications in combat.
text.event: You trip over the Catapult, dust it off, and stick it in your pack.
text.name: Catapult

text.description: {Ballista} Use this war machine to target your enemy's troops in combat.
text.event: You trip over the Ballista, dust it off, and stick it in your pack.
text.name: Ballista

text.description: {Ammo Cart} The Ammo Cart ensures that your missile troops will never run out of ammunition in combat.
text.event: You trip over the Ammo Cart, dust it off, and stick it in your pack.
text.name: Ammo Cart

text.description: {First Aid Tent} The First Aid Tent provides healing to your troops during each round of combat.
text.event: You trip over the First Aid Tent, dust it off, and stick it in your pack.
text.name: First Aid Tent
